title: Tesla Shifts From Cars to Chips: Revenue Down 10 Percent
description: Tesla is accelerating a pivot away from traditional car manufacturing and toward artificial intelligence, robotics, and chip production, even as revenue from its core auto business continues to slide, CNBC reports.

title: Kevin Warsh set to face early reality check as Trump’s man at the Fed
description: Kevin Warsh has been nominated by President Donald Trump as the next chair of the US Federal Reserve and faces an early test as he seeks to deliver on promises of major policy change. Warsh has pledged to shrink the Feds balance sheet and argued that artificial intelligence–driven productivity gains will keep inflation low, creating room for lower interest rates. After three rate cuts late last year, the Fed paused in January amid persistent inflation and a steady labour market, with markets not expecting another cut before June.
